00035 ReportsPrint *ReportsPrint::thisInstance = 0;
00036 
00037 ReportsPrint::ReportsPrint() : QPrinter(QPrinter::HighResolution)
00038 {
00039     settings = Settings::instance();
00040     setPrinterName(settings->getPrinterPrinterName());
00041     setOutputToFile(settings->getPrinterOutputToFile());
00042     setOutputFileName(settings->getPrinterOutputFileName());
00043     setPrintProgram(settings->getPrinterPrintProgram());
00044     setOrientation(settings->getPrinterOrientation());
00045     setPageSize(settings->getPrinterPageSize());
00046     setPageOrder(settings->getPrinterPageOrder());
00047     setColorMode(settings->getPrinterColorMode());
00048     setPaperSource(settings->getPrinterPaperSource());
00049 }
00050 
00051 ReportsPrint::~ReportsPrint()
00052 {
00053     settings->setPrinterPrinterName(printerName());
00054     settings->setPrinterOutputToFile(outputToFile());
00055     settings->setPrinterOutputFileName(outputFileName());
00056     settings->setPrinterPrintProgram(printProgram());
00057     settings->setPrinterOrientation(orientation());
00058     settings->setPrinterPageSize(pageSize());
00059     settings->setPrinterPageOrder(pageOrder());
00060     settings->setPrinterColorMode(colorMode());
00061     settings->setPrinterPaperSource(paperSource());
00062 }
00063 
00064 ReportsPrint* ReportsPrint::instance()
00065 {
00066     if(thisInstance == 0)
00067         thisInstance = new ReportsPrint;
00068     return thisInstance;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ReportsPrint::destroy()
00072 {
00073     if(thisInstance != 0)
00074         delete thisInstance;
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool ReportsPrint::printReport(const QString &header, const QString &data,
00078         const QString docName)
00079 {
00080     if(setup(0))
00081     {
00082     setDocName(docName);
00083 
00084         QPainter painter(this);
00085 
00086         QPaintDeviceMetrics metrics(this);
00087         int headerGap = metrics.logicalDpiY() / 2;  // half inch
00088     int vertMargin = metrics.logicalDpiY() / 2;
00089     int horizMargin = metrics.logicalDpiX() / 2;
00090 
00091         QFont headerFont("Verdana", 8);
00092         QFont dataFont("Verdana", 8);
00093     
00094         QSimpleRichText headerText(header, headerFont);
00095     
00096         headerText.setWidth(&painter, painter.window().width());
00097 
00098         int pageHeight = (painter.window().height()
00099                   - headerText.height()
00100               - (headerGap * 2)  // * 2: just to make the space to the footer greater
00101               - (vertMargin * 2));
00102 
00103         QSimpleRichText dataText(data, dataFont, "", 0, 0, pageHeight);
00104         dataText.setWidth(&painter, painter.window().width() - (horizMargin * 2));
00105 
00106         int numPages = (int)ceil((double)dataText.height() / pageHeight);
00107 
00108         int index;
00109 
00110         for(int i = 0; i < (int)numCopies(); ++i)
00111         {
00112             for(int j = 0; j < numPages; ++j)
00113             {
00114                 if(i > 0 || j > 0)
00115                     newPage();
00116 
00117                 if(pageOrder() == QPrinter::LastPageFirst)
00118                     index = numPages - j - 1;
00119                 else
00120                     index = j;
00121 
00122                 QRect headerRect(0, 0, headerText.width(), headerText.height());
00123 
00124                 QRect dataRect(0, (index * pageHeight), dataText.width(), pageHeight);
00125             
00126         if(j != 0)
00127         {
00128             painter.save();
00129             painter.translate(0, vertMargin);
00130                     headerText.draw(&painter, 0, 0, headerRect, QColorGroup());
00131             painter.restore();
00132         }
00133 
00134                 painter.save();
00135 
00136         if(j == 0)
00137         {
00138             painter.translate(horizMargin,
00139                     -dataRect.top() + vertMargin);
00140         }
00141         else
00142         {
00143             painter.translate(horizMargin,
00144                     -dataRect.top() + headerGap + vertMargin);
00145         }
00146                 dataText.draw(&painter, 0, 0, dataRect, QColorGroup());
00147                 painter.restore();
00148 
00149                 painter.setFont(dataFont);
00150         painter.save();
00151         painter.translate(0, 0 - vertMargin);
00152                 painter.drawText(painter.window(), Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignBottom,
00153                                  QString("Page " + QString::number(j + 1) + " of " +
00154                      QString::number(numPages)));
00155         painter.restore();
00156 
00157             }
00158         }
00159     return true;
00160     }
00161     return false;
00162 }
